title: Sooooo... When's Eve's rework coming out?
body: Was just wondering when riot plans to realease Eve's rework. I thought they would follow the pattern of the kayn and urgot releases where there was a 10 day period in between the two, so I was expecting eve to be released on Friday laat week, but it's monday now and there's still no new news about anything eve related. Pls rito, ur killing me Q.Q

replies.body: They only ever do one thing at a time, Ornn is coming out next patch, Eve may be the patch after that or later.
